name: Adobe Lightroom Module
summary: Learn about .AGMODULE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AGMODULE files and LRMODULE files are located in the "Plugins" folder in the same directory as the application.
NOTE: Lightroom was formerly known as Photoshop Lightroom.

description: Module used by Adobe Lightroom, a professional application that helps users edit and organize digital photos; similar to the .LRMODULE file; provides functionality to Lightroom, such as a layout toolkit and book module.
